statements: SELECT * FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY student_name ASC
SELECT student_name, subject FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade < 70 ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT id, student_name, grade FROM StudentGrades WHERE semester = 'Fall'
SELECT * FROM StudentGrades WHERE subject = 'Math' OR subject = 'Science'
SELECT student_name, grade, semester FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade BETWEEN 60 AND 80
SELECT student_name, grade, subject FROM StudentGrades WHERE semester = 'Spring' ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade > 80 AND subject = 'Math' ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade, subject FROM StudentGrades GROUP BY subject ORDER BY average_grade DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT student_name, subject FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade < 70;
SELECT MAX(grade) AS highest_grade, semester FROM StudentGrades WHERE semester = 'Fall';
SELECT * FROM student_grades;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM student_grades WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM student_grades ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_id, exam_type, score FROM academic_performance WHERE score < 70;
SELECT student_id, student_name, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM student_grades GROUP BY student_id, student_name;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade FROM student_grades WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM student_grades WHERE grade > 90 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade FROM student_grades JOIN academic_performance ON student_grades.student_id = academic_performance.student_id WHERE exam_type = 'final';
SELECT student_name, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM student_grades JOIN academic_performance ON student_grades.student_id = academic_performance.student_id GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT student_name, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM student_grades GROUP BY student_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE grade > 90;

SELECT student_name, course_name, course_credit FROM Students INNER JOIN StudentGrades ON Students.student_id = StudentGrades.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON StudentGrades.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_id, grade, semester FROM StudentGrades WHERE semester = 'Spring' ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE course_credit BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade, academic_performance FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM Courses ORDER BY course_credit DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN StudentGrades ON Students.student_id = StudentGrades.student_id JOIN Courses ON StudentGrades.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade, semester FROM Students JOIN StudentGrades ON Students.student_id = StudentGrades.student_id WHERE semester = 'Fall';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE grade > 90;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM courses ORDER BY credit_hours DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM student_courses WHERE grade < 70;
SELECT student_id, gpa, enrollment_year FROM academic_performance WHERE gpa < 3.0;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE grade > 80;

SELECT students.first_name, students.last_name, courses.course_name FROM students JOIN student_courses ON students.id = student_courses.student_id JOIN courses ON courses.course_id = student_courses.course_id;

SELECT students.first_name, students.last_name, courses.course_name FROM students LEFT JOIN student_courses ON students.id = student_courses.student_id LEFT JOIN courses ON courses.course_id = student_courses.course_id;

SELECT students.first_name, students.last_name, academic_performance.gpa FROM students JOIN academic_performance ON students.id = academic_performance.student_id WHERE academic_performance.enrollment_year >= 2020;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT professor_name, department FROM professors WHERE department = 'Computer Science';
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM enrollments WHERE grade IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade > 10;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses WHERE credits >= 3;
SELECT professor_name, department FROM professors WHERE department = 'Computer Science';
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students s JOIN enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN courses c ON c.course_id = e.course_id;
